translations.translation: there is hospitality of scalding water
The welcome will be boiling water
then he will be served boiling water,
its dwelling will be boiling water
Then his reception is the hot boiling water.
Then for him is an entertainment with Hamim.
He shall have an entertainment of boiling water,
there shall be a hospitality of boiling water
Then the welcome will be boiling water
he will be welcomed with boiling water.
Then an entertainment of boiling water.
then a treat of boiling water
For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.
Then for him is entertainment with boiling water.
there shall be a hospitality of boiling water,
Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
[56:93] then a welcome of boiling water,
(Then the welcome) their food will be of Zaqqum while their drink (will be boiling water

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَنُزُلٌ } فله نزل { مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ } [الواقعة: 93] بدل ما لا يتعطش في النشأة الأولى إلى زلال برد اليقين، ولا يشرب رشحة وجرعة من رحيق المعرفة والتوحيد
